text: The Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference (CPPCC, ), also known as the People's PCC (, ) or simply the PCC (), is a political organization in the People's Republic of China. The organisation is made up of delegates from eight legally-allowed political parties and other organisations, as well as independent members. The CPPCC is controlled by the United Front Work Department. ==References== Category:Political organizations in the People's Republic of China
title: Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference
